None.Name: Blessed Ice Breaker
None.Description: Building is surrounded by an icy aura with a 25m radius that enables all friendly entities within it to deal 125% of their usual damage against frozen units. Additionally, within this frosty aura every enemy will stay frozen 25% longer than usually.
